mapper.select: SELECT b.bo_number, b.email, b.bo_checkIn, b.bo_checkOut, b.payDate, r.ro_id, r.ro_name, r.ro_checkIn, r.ro_checkOut, r.ro_price, a.acc_name, a.acc_id FROM booking b JOIN room r ON b.ro_id = r.ro_id JOIN accommodation a ON r.acc_id = a.acc_id WHERE b.email = #{email} ORDER BY b.payDate DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT b.bo_number, b.email, b.bo_checkIn, b.bo_checkOut, b.payDate, r.ro_id, r.ro_name, r.ro_checkIn, r.ro_checkOut, r.ro_price, a.acc_name, a.acc_id FROM booking b JOIN room r ON b.ro_id = r.ro_id JOIN accommodation a ON r.acc_id = a.acc_id WHERE b.email = #{email} ORDER BY b.payDate DESC

SELECT b.*, r.ro_id, r.ro_name, r.ro_checkIn, r.ro_checkOut, r.ro_price, a.acc_name, a.acc_id FROM booking b JOIN room r ON b.ro_id = r.ro_id JOIN accommodation a ON r.acc_id = a.acc_id WHERE b.bo_number = #{bo_number}
